[color=green]
Well, Only 1 source for Hindi Audio from Kartik is avail on Net,
Now a days no availability of that VCD in Retail Stores...
Extracted Theatrical audio from Kartik's Rip, but shows gliches & unsync in re-encode !!!,
So firstly removed gliches & synced that to theatrical version... Then Started to sync with Extended Version.

Extended Version is 773.5 sec (~13 min) longer. It's not really easy to find each & every lip sync...!
Made 18 spots for adding english audio to filling gap from in audio...

Afterall, It's in perfect lip sync, But that depends upon you guys..
If u like, Just Grab it.. It's free.. If u don't, leave it... 

...afterall these type hardwork really needs appreciation... Regards...
If anyone wants timecodes, Pm me... but don't ask for audio.. Just grab it, super seeded...

...Check sample to verify Quality...

...Enjoy...[/color][/size]
